name: Mystery Village: Shards of the Past
description: Mystery Village: Shards of the Past is a dark, enigmatic story of loss, retrieval and hope. Travel to a long abandoned settlement where your friend was born, deal with those who still haunt it and discover uncanny secrets of that place.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
